original_text: But if all of you are speaking clear messages from God, a visitor will understand you. He may not believe in God. He may not have learned much about God. But he will hear God's message. He will understand that he has done wrong things. He will know that God will judge him. He will learn this from what all of you are saying. But if all of you are speaking clear messages from God, a visitor will understand you. He may not believe in God. He may not have learned much about God. But he will hear God's message. He will understand that he has done wrong things. He will know that God will judge him. He will learn this from what all of you are saying.
korean_text: 그러나 다 예언을 하면 믿지 아니하는 자들이나 알지 못하는 자들이 들어와서 모든 사람에게 책망을 들으며 모든 사람에게 판단을 받고

sentences.original_text: But if all of you are speaking clear messages from God
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 여러분 모두가 하나님으로부터 온 명확한 메시지를 전한다면

sentences.original_text: He may not believe in God
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님을 믿지 않을 수도 있습니다

sentences.original_text: He may not have learned much about God
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님에 대해 많이 배우지 않았을 수도 있습니다

sentences.original_text: But he will hear God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 하나님의 메시지를 들을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will understand that he has done wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 잘못된 일들을 했다는 것을 이해할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will know that God will judge him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님께서 자신을 심판하실 것이라는 것을 알게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will learn this from what all of you are saying
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여러분 모두가 말하는 것으로부터 이것을 배우게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But if all of you are speaking clear messages from God
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 여러분 모두가 하나님으로부터 온 명확한 메시지를 전한다면

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님을 믿지 않을 수도 있습니다

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님에 대해 많이 배우지 않았을 수도 있습니다

sentences.original_text: But he will hear God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 하나님의 메시지를 들을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will understand that he has done wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 잘못된 일들을 했다는 것을 이해할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will know that God will judge him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님께서 자신을 심판하실 것이라는 것을 알게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will learn this from what all of you are saying
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여러분 모두가 말하는 것으로부터 이것을 배우게 될 것입니다
